H0.text: Which team won the first 'Super Bowl'. Kansas City Chiefs

H1.text: Which team won the first 'Super Bowl'. Los Angeles Rams

H2.text: Which team won the first 'Super Bowl'. New York Giants

H3.text: Which team won the first 'Super Bowl'. Packers

A4.text: The NFL's Green Bay Packers won the first two Super Bowls

A5.text: The Packers defeated the Kansas City Chiefs 35–10 in Super Bowl I

A6.text: The Packers won Super Bowl II with a 33–14 victory over the Oakland Raiders
